mapper.select: SELECT z.id, z.zwmc , z.dwid ,p.id as pid,p.dwmc,p.dwjs,p.lxfs,p.sshy, p.locate, r.id as rid,r.hymc FROM zpzw z left join zpdw p on z.dwid=p.id left join zphy r on r.id = p.sshy order by id desc

SELECT z.id, z.zwmc , z.dwid ,p.id as pid,p.dwmc,p.dwjs,p.lxfs,p.sshy,r.id as rid,r.hymc FROM zpzw z left join zpdw p on z.dwid=p.id left join zphy r on r.id = p.sshy
z.id = #{id}

SELECT z.id, z.zwmc , z.dwid ,p.id as pid,p.dwmc,p.dwjs,p.lxfs,p.sshy, p.locate, r.id as rid,r.hymc FROM zpzw z left join zpdw p on p.id =z.dwid left join zphy r on r.id = p.sshy
z.zwmc like "%"#{q}"%" or p.dwmc like "%"#{q}"%" or p.lxfs like "%"#{q}"%"
and r.id =#{job_type}
and p.locate like #{job_locate1}"%"
or p.locate like #{job_locate2}"%"
order by r.hymc ,p.locate
